definitions.body: father of Gaal Ju Jdg 9:26, Jdg 9:28, Jdg 9:30, Jdg 9:31, Jdg 9:35 (GFM, after Hollenb:ThLz 1891, 371 [cf. Bu:Ib. 1892, 63] [[עׂבֵד]], as LXXL; v. also Gray:Prop. N. 184, 272); LXX Iwbhl, A LXXL Abed.
a companion of Ezra Ezr 8:6; LXX Wbhq, LXXL Aminadab.—For list of Ar. names beginning with 9bd v. Nö:ZMG xli (1887), 724 ff., cf. also Id:ib, xlii (1888), 486 We:Heid. 2, 2 ff.
